name: Confetti Genie
description:
Generate random confetti pattern on your canvas.

It works with frame layers. Select the amount of confetti you want to add to selected frames and click 'Generate'.


You can now add colors of your choice or generate colors randomly for your confetti.


Shapes included

  1. Rectangles
  2. Circles
  3. Triangles
  4. Polygons
  5. Stars
